content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **totally textured blanket can be crocheted in many sizes** this textured crochet blanket pattern is perfect for any crafty crocheter looking to add a cozy home decor touch using the alpine and basket weave stitches this pattern is sure to give your creations dimension and texture you ll find written and video instructions included making creating a beautiful blanket in your desired size easier than ever perfect for baby rooms or anywhere you want to add a warm handmade touch you ll love how simple yet stylish these blankets look draped over the couch or draped on the end of the bed crochet something special with this textured crochet blanket pattern today this totally textured blanket has a stitch video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=x5vcehzauh8 **crochet hook ** recommended hook size j 6 0mm 1 - or size to meet gauge **notations ** removable stitch marker 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 and make french knots scissors 4 **yarn ** mary maxim maximum value 5 100% acrylic 474yds/8oz suggested yarn substitutes wecrochet brava worsted 6 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g **yardage ** the yardage will vary upon the size made there is a chart in the pattern and on the blog to help you determine size and yardage **abbreviations** bpdc - back post double_crochet chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet fpdc - front post double_crochet pm - place marker round- round slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 7 **gauge ** 12 sts and 16 row unblocked = 4x4 inches in alpine stitch 8 not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 9 **blanket measurements/sizes ** the measurement will vary on the desired crochet blanket size there is a chart in the pattern and on the blog to help you determine size and yardage **skill level ** intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 10 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns 11 / facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns 12 / community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 13 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 14 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 15 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns 16 it is much appreciated and loved © 2023 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please
